  • ABOUT

Thomas Clegg is a Manchester based designer and sometimes front-end developer with a focus on anything digital.

Most recently he has been building apps and websites with talented developers, strategists and designers all over the world. He enjoy finding new ways to increase productivity and communication when working together remotely or on-site and constantly strives to integrate new skills and tools into his workflow. Outcomes include identity, branding, illustration, UX workshops and Strategy.
Client List

Diageo, AstraZeneca, Manchester Art Gallery, Hawkins\Brown,
Da Vinci Learning, What Should We Do?!, Johnnie Walker, Singleton, Havas Lynx, Gruum.
